titles.title: HP372 Our Father, whose creative love

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Our Father, whose creative love
The gift of life bestows,
Each child of earthly union born
Thy heavenly likeness shows.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Grant those entrusted with the care
Of precious life from thee,
Thy grace, that worthy of the gift
And faithful they may be.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
And, highest task, to feed the soul
With Christ, the living bread;
That each unfolding life may grow
Strong in thy paths to tread.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
These parents need thy wisdom's light,
Thy love within their heart;
Bless thou their home, and for their task
Thy Spirit's grace impart.
